trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented, animates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 抽象類別，實作時會以動畫方式顯示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the derived <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> class using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用衍生<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames>類別使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: See the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md) for information about extending animation classes.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[自訂動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)延伸動畫類別的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationBase" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationBase" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationBase" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 取得動畫目前的值。

trans-unit.source: The origin value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own start value.
trans-unit.target: 在動畫沒有自己的起始值之情況下，要提供給動畫的初始值。

trans-unit.source: The destination value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own destination value.
trans-unit.target: 在動畫沒有自己的起始值之情況下，要提供給動畫的目的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> which can generate the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" />，可產生 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> 值，供動畫使用以產生其輸出值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 取得動畫目前的值。

trans-unit.source: The value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.
trans-unit.target: 這個動畫認為應該是該屬性目前值的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain:
trans-unit.target: 值`defaultOriginValue`參數取決於撰寫鏈結中的動畫的位置：

trans-unit.source: If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 如果動畫是在撰寫鏈結中的第一個位置，而且它會取代另一個動畫，`defaultOriginValue`是它已取代次動畫的輸出。

trans-unit.source: If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property.
trans-unit.target: 如果動畫是撰寫鏈結中的第一個位置中，而且沒有動畫來取代，`defaultOriginValue`是動畫屬性的基底值。

trans-unit.source: If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個動畫不在第一個位置組合的鏈結，然後`defaultOriginValue`是前一個動畫中有撰寫鏈結所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>不<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> composition layer.
trans-unit.target: 值`defaultDestinationValue`參數取決於是否已存在的先前屬性<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>組合圖層。

trans-unit.source: If there is a previous property <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer.
trans-unit.target: 如果前一個屬性<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>組合圖層，`defaultDestinationValue`是來自該圖層的輸出。

trans-unit.source: If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何先前的組合圖層，`defaultDestinationValue`是會顯示動畫之屬性的基底值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需動畫組合的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何建立自訂動畫類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The origin value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own start value.
trans-unit.target: 在動畫沒有自己的起始值之情況下，要提供給動畫的初始值。

trans-unit.source: The destination value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own destination value.
trans-unit.target: 在動畫沒有自己的起始值之情況下，要提供給動畫的目的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> which can generate the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" />，可產生 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> 值，供動畫使用以產生其輸出值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 取得動畫目前的值。

trans-unit.source: The value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.
trans-unit.target: 這個動畫認為應該是該屬性目前值的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain:
trans-unit.target: 值`defaultOriginValue`參數取決於撰寫鏈結中的動畫的位置：

trans-unit.source: If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 如果動畫是在撰寫鏈結中的第一個位置，而且它會取代另一個動畫，`defaultOriginValue`是它已取代次動畫的輸出。

trans-unit.source: If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property.
trans-unit.target: 如果動畫是撰寫鏈結中的第一個位置中，而且沒有動畫來取代，`defaultOriginValue`是動畫屬性的基底值。

trans-unit.source: If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個動畫不在第一個位置組合的鏈結，然後`defaultOriginValue`是前一個動畫中有撰寫鏈結所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>不<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> composition layer.
trans-unit.target: 值`defaultDestinationValue`參數取決於是否已存在的先前屬性<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>組合圖層。

trans-unit.source: If there is a previous property <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer.
trans-unit.target: 如果前一個屬性<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>組合圖層，`defaultDestinationValue`是來自該圖層的輸出。

trans-unit.source: If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何先前的組合圖層，`defaultDestinationValue`是會顯示動畫之屬性的基底值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需動畫組合的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何建立自訂動畫類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.
trans-unit.target: 建議的原始值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的起始值，便會使用這個值。

trans-unit.source: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.
trans-unit.target: 建議的目的值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的結束值，便會使用這個值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> that generates the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> used by the host animation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" />，產生主機動畫所用的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the host animation.
trans-unit.target: 計算值，代表正在顯示動畫之屬性的目前值，由主機動畫所決定。

trans-unit.source: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的計算值，由目前的動畫所決定。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain:
trans-unit.target: 值`defaultOriginValue`參數取決於撰寫鏈結中的動畫的位置：

trans-unit.source: If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 如果動畫是在撰寫鏈結中的第一個位置，而且它會取代另一個動畫，`defaultOriginValue`是它已取代次動畫的輸出。

trans-unit.source: If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property.
trans-unit.target: 如果動畫是撰寫鏈結中的第一個位置中，而且沒有動畫來取代，`defaultOriginValue`是動畫屬性的基底值。

trans-unit.source: If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個動畫不在第一個位置組合的鏈結，然後`defaultOriginValue`是前一個動畫中有撰寫鏈結所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>不<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> composition layer.
trans-unit.target: 值`defaultDestinationValue`參數取決於是否已存在的先前屬性<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>組合圖層。

trans-unit.source: If there is a previous property <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer.
trans-unit.target: 如果前一個屬性<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>組合圖層，`defaultDestinationValue`是來自該圖層的輸出。

trans-unit.source: If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何先前的組合圖層，`defaultDestinationValue`是會顯示動畫之屬性的基底值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需動畫組合的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何建立自訂動畫類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of value this animation generates.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個動畫所產生值的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of value produced by this animation.
trans-unit.target: 這個動畫所產生值的類型。
